name: SolutionXchange
overview:
About SolutionXchange

As competition intensifies globally, it is becoming increasingly important for companies to look beyond the borders of isolated internal expertise to create sustainable competitive advantage. Genpact realizes that achieving success in this new ecosystem calls for forging new partnerships committed to generating innovative solutions. In the spirit of “Open Innovation”, Genpact created SolutionXchange to collaborate with top-notch industry experts and facilitate an environment where exchange of ideas can help generate winning solutions to business challenges.

The platform delivers clear benefits to all participants. Genpact and its clients post business challenges on the SolutionXchange website and offer registered experts significant financial rewards for submitting the most innovative solution. The solutions submitted by experts are evaluated by Genpact internal experts and in some cases by client representatives that post the challenge, based on predetermined criteria. Solutions are kept completely confidential and the IP transfer process is managed by Genpact (refer Terms and Conditions & FAQ for more information).

The business challenges posted on the network broadly fall under the following domains and industries:

Domains:

Analytics Collections Contact Center Customer Relationship Management ERP and Software Solutions Finance and Accounting Human Resources IT Infrastructure Management Learning and Knowledge Management Legal Procurement and Supply Chain Reengineering Risk Management Sales and Marketing

Industries:

Automotive Aviation Banking & Financial Services Chemicals & Specialty Products CPG & Retail Healthcare-Payer Healthcare-Provider Hi-Tech & Electronics Insurance Manufacturing Media and Entertainment Oil & Gas and Energy Pharmaceuticals Telecommunications Transportation & Logistics Travel and Hospitality
